connect20/virtina_attachments.name: connect20/Virtina_Attachments

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/virtina_attachments.description: The Catalog Attachments extension is a simple tool to upload product related files through admin panel and display the files in the product view page. There is a configuration section in the admin side to configure the module.
